extName.description: The display name for the extension

tabsCount.description: Text showing the number of tabs, $COUNT$ will be replaced with the actual number

closeTab.description: Tooltip for the close tab button

errorGetTabInfo.description: Error message when failing to get tab info, $ERROR$ will be replaced with the error message

noPrevTab.message: 没有可切换的上一个标签页

invalidTabId.description: Message shown when tab ID is invalid

languageLabel.description: Label for the language selection dropdown

englishOption.description: Option for English in language dropdown

chineseOption.description: Option for Chinese in language dropdown

simplifiedChineseOption.description: Option for Simplified Chinese in language dropdown

errorSavingSettings.description: Prefix for error message when saving settings fails

settingsSaved.description: Confirmation message when settings are saved successfully

aboutDescription.message: MyTabSearch是一个Chrome扩展，帮助您快速搜索和切换打开的标签页。通过简单的键盘快捷键，您可以访问所有打开的标签页并在几秒钟内找到所需的标签页。
aboutDescription.description: Description text for the about page

featuresHeading.description: Heading for the features section on the about page

featureSearchTabs.message: 快速搜索所有打开的标签页
featureSearchTabs.description: Description of the search tabs feature

featureKeyboardNav.description: Description of the keyboard navigation feature

featureOneClickSwitch.description: Description of the one-click switching feature

featureCloseFromResults.message: 直接从搜索结果关闭标签页
featureCloseFromResults.description: Description of the close from results feature

featureSwitchPrevious.message: 支持切换到上一个标签页
featureSwitchPrevious.description: Description of the previous tab switching feature

featureRememberState.message: 记住最后活动标签页状态
featureRememberState.description: Description of the state remembering feature

shortcutsHeading.description: Heading for the shortcuts section on the about page

openPopupText.message: 打开标签页搜索弹出窗口
openPopupText.description: Description for the popup opening shortcut

switchPrevText.description: Description for the previous tab switching shortcut

switchSelectedText.description: Description for the selection switching shortcut

closeTabText.description: Description for the tab closing shortcut

usageTipsHeading.description: Heading for the usage tips section on the about page

tipShortcutKey.message: 调出标签页列表的快捷键是 Ctrl+Shift+A。
tipShortcutKey.description: Tip about the main shortcut key

tipPrevTabShortcut.message: 快速切换到之前打开标签页的快捷键是 Ctrl+Shift+S (自v1.6.0起)。
tipPrevTabShortcut.description: Tip about the previous tab shortcut key

tipShortcutConflict.message: 如果默认快捷键无法正常工作，可能是按键冲突导致的。您可以在 chrome://extensions/shortcuts 中手动调整。

tipPinExtension.message: 为获得更流畅的用户体验，建议在安装后直接将扩展固定到浏览器工具栏。

madeWithLove.message: 用心制作，带来更好的浏览体验
madeWithLove.description: Text in the footer of the about page

copyrightText.description: Copyright text for the about page

pinnedTabsDesc.description: Description for the pinned tabs command

pinnedTabsLimit.message: 固定标签页数量已达上限（最多$count$个）
pinnedTabsLimit.description: Message shown when trying to pin more than the limit, $count$ will be replaced with the actual limit

pinTab.description: Tooltip for the pin tab button

unpinTab.description: Tooltip for the unpin tab button

pinToFavorites.description: Tooltip for the pin to favorites button

pinnedTabsTitle.description: Title for the pinned tabs list

noPinnedTabs.description: Message shown when there are no pinned tabs

pinTabsHint.message: 使用 Ctrl+Shift+A 打开搜索并固定标签页
pinTabsHint.description: Hint text for how to pin tabs

longTermPinnedNeedVip.message: 您的体验期已结束，续费VIP会员后即可继续使用长期固定功能

longTermPinnedFailed.description: Toast message when long term pinned failed

longTermPinnedSuccess.description: Toast message when long term pinned success
